      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AngleAnimator
      Animates angles, via an interpolator.
      class  BasicAnimator
      A base class for an interpolating Animator.
      class  CompoundAnimator
      A group of two or more Animators.
      class  DoubleAnimator
      An Animator implentation for animating values of type Double.
      class  MoveToDoubleAnimator
      Animates the value to the specified end position, using the specified smoothing, until the value is within the specified minEpsilon of the end value.
      class  MoveToPositionAnimator 
      class  PositionAnimator 
      class  RotateToAngleAnimator
